t: Then*p the Lord*s said to me, “Go again, love a woman who*i is*i loved by a lover and is committing adultery, just like the love of the Lord*s for the children of Israel, who look to other gods and love the*i raisin cakes of*i the*i pagans.”*i
So*p I bought her for myself for fifteen shekels*i of silver, and one and one-half homers of barley.
And I said to her, “You shall stay with me many days; you shall not play the harlot, nor shall you have a man—so, too, will*i I be*i toward you.”
For*p the children of Israel shall abide many days without king or prince, without sacrifice or sacred*i pillar, without ephod or teraphim.
Afterward the children of Israel shall return and seek the Lord*s their God and David their king. They shall fear the Lord*s and His goodness in the latter days.
